entities.name: borgin
entities.description: Borgin is a person who slammed the door behind Hermione. (‘As the bell tinkled again, Borgin slammed the door behind her and put up the ‘Closed’ sign.’)

entities.description: Hermione is a person who was with Ron and Harry. (‘Well, next time you can show me how it’s done, Master of Mystery!’ she snapped.)
